snippet: That Patriots-Steelers matchup Sunday sure looked like a Game of the Year candidate. Then all of the air went out of it when Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger damaged his knee....
lead_paragraph: That Patriots-Steelers matchup Sunday sure looked like a Game of the Year candidate. Then all of the air went out of it when Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger damaged his knee.

headline.main: It's Not Always Who You Play, but When You Play Them in NFL
headline.print_headline: It's Not Always Who You Play, but When You Play Them in NFL
